title: 2 BEDROOM APARTMENT EAST 79th St AVAILABLE NOW-MOVE IN TODAY
posting_body: ****RENTED-NO LONGER AVAILABLE****
Sunny and quiet 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment on nice block on 79th st. Parking included.
Tenant pays their separate gas and electric.
600 a month plus 600 security deposit to move in.
Must have proof of income of 1500 a month before taxes and no evictions in the last 5 years.
No Drugs.
Must have proof of income.
If interested in moving in in the next 10 days email or text your name, where you work?
How long on the job?
How much you make a month?
After I respond to your text I’ll request proof of income and you may schedule a viewing.
You pay gas and electric.
I’m going to pay for the replacement of the front boarded window as soon as someone pays their deposit and moves in.
Huge livingroom but the bedrooms are small and will not fit a queen size bed.
***IMPORTANT NOTICE***
The downstairs tenant is responsible for:
#1 racking leaves and trash Infront of the house.
#2 shoveling the snow in driveway so their car can get out during the winter.
(If you don’t have a car you don’t need to shovel driveway)
#3 shoveling 3 foot wide path on sidewalk Infront of house so pedestrians can walk down the street.
Upstairs tenant does not have a car and is not strong enough to shovel a path through the snow on sidewalk.
